hints.content: Let's look at each graph and find the number of pictures for each type of fox.

##Graph 1

[[☃ image 1]]

Type of Fox | Number of [[☃ image 2]]|Number of foxes
:- | :-: | :-:
Red | $2$ | ${2}\times\blueD4=8$ foxes
Arctic | $6$ | ${6}\times\blueD4=24$ foxes
Gray | $8$ | ${8}\times\blueD4=32$ foxes
Kit | $4$ | ${4}\times\blueD4=16$ foxes

$\begin{align}
\text{Gray fox} - \text{Kit fox} &= 4\\\\
32 - 16 &\neq 4
\end{align}$

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Foxes and the vertical axis labeled Type of Fox. Each Type of Fox is listed along the vertical axis from bottom to top as follows: Kit, Gray, Arctic, and Red. The number of foxes for each type of fox is represented by the number of pictures of foxes plotted on the graph. Kit is represented by 4 pictures of foxes, Gray represented by 8 pictures of foxes, Arctic is represented by 6 pictures of foxes, and Red is represented by 2 pictures of foxes !

hints.content:
##Graph 2


[[☃ image 1]]

Type of Fox | Number of [[☃ image 2]]| Number of foxes
:- | :-: | :-:
Red | $6$ | ${6}\times\blueD4=24$ foxes
Arctic | $2$ | ${2}\times\blueD4=8$ foxes
Gray | $4$ | ${4}\times\blueD4=16$ foxes
Kit | $3$ | ${3}\times\blueD4=12$ foxes

$\begin{align}
\text{Gray fox} - \text{Kit fox} &= 4\\\\
16 - 12 &= 4
\end{align}$

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Foxes and the vertical axis labeled Type of Fox. Each Type of Fox is listed along the vertical axis from bottom to top as follows: Kit, Gray, Arctic, and Red. The number of foxes for each type of fox is represented by the number of pictures of foxes plotted on the graph. Kit is represented by 3 pictures of foxes, Gray represented by 4 pictures of foxes, Arctic is represented by 2 pictures of foxes, and Red is represented by 6 pictures of foxes. !

question.content:
Gia creates picture graphs to show the number of foxes at two nature centers.  


[[☃ image 1]]

  

**In which nature center are there $4$ more Gray foxes than Kit foxes?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A picture of a fox equals 4 foxes. !
